news.title: Berkshire Hathaway operating earnings drop more than expected as Buffett warns of tariff uncertainty
news.summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway reported first-quarter results on Saturday. The results showed a steep drop in earnings from the year-earlier period.

news.title: Earnings show one tech segment starting to feel the tariff pinch fastest
news.summary: Advertising-heavy businesses seem to be holding on in the near-term. Consumer-focused models start to feel the pinch from slowing spending.

news.title: Temu halts shipping direct from China as de minimis tariff loophole is cut off
news.summary: Temu added "import charges" ranging from 130% to 150% on products shipped direct from China. Earlier this week, Temu increased prices and added " import charges"

news.title: 60 years at Berkshire: See Warren Buffett's 'Woodstock for Capitalists' over the decades
news.summary: Review how this year's shareholder meeting will run and how it's evolved over the decades. Shareholders will vote on whether or not to give the company more money.

news.title: Trump's China tariffs are raising costs for wedding dresses and threatening the small shops that sell them
news.summary: The higher duties on bridal gowns and special occasion dresses have raised costs for boutiques and designers across the country. The cost of a bridal dress can run into the thousands of dollars.

news.title: How Warren Buffett went from picking horses to picking stocks — and what you can learn from it
news.summary: Buffett’s sharp insights on racing odds would later help him build his Berkshire Hathaway billions. Buffett: ‘I’m not a gambler. I’ve never gambled.’ ‘If you’re going to bet, you�’d better bet on the outcome.”

news.title: ‘I’m very cynical’: My stepmother, 85, makes bizarre requests for money from my father’s $10M trust. Should I be concerned?
news.summary: “He used a crappy lawyer to set up a very boilerplate trust agreement,” says the lawyer. “He’s not a good person,’ the lawyer adds.

news.title: If you read April’s jobs report, you won’t be surprised by the No. 1 ‘best job’ in America
news.summary: There was strong jobs growth in one industry in April, but that does not necessarily add up to a healthy U.S. labor market and economy.

news.title: ‘We are the most privileged’: My husband and I are tired of paying for our friends. How do we get them to pay their way?
news.summary: “My husband almost always ends up paying for everyone or picks up the entire bill,” she said. “My husbands almost always pays for everyone.”

news.title: My ailing parent’s house burned down in the California fires. Will our brother, who took care of them, lose his inheritance?
news.summary: “How can the insurance proceeds and legal settlement not be protected from our estranged sibling?” she asks. “How Can the Insurance Proceeds and Legal settlement not Be protected from Our Estranged Sister?’
